mapper.sql: t.id AS "id", t.parent_id AS "ParentId", t.icon AS "Icon", t.sort AS "Sort", t.name AS "Name", t.url AS "Url", t.lang_cn AS "LangCn", t.parent_tree as "ParentTree", t.description AS "Description"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recharge_sys_node ( parent_id, parent_tree, icon, sort, `name`, url, lang_cn, description ) VALUES ( #{ParentId}, #{ParentTree}, #{Icon}, #{Sort}, #{Name}, #{Url}, #{LangCn}, #{Description} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM recharge_sys_node t WHERE ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
mapper.delete: UPDATE recharge_sys_node set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
